Necross/ Splattercannon:
 
Necoss ran to an open spot closer to Blackfang and transformed into his gun platform mode.  He trained his sights on the Maximals and opened fire with both missiles and globs of acid.
 
Splattercannon had decided taht the others were fine by themselves so he turned and started toward the Maximal base.

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
BlackFang/DarkFate/Nightstrike/BlackNightmare

BlackFang doged most of shots and quickly covered opened his comlink 
and shouted "BLACK FANG TO MAXIMALS.... I'M UNDER ATTACK... i REPEAT 
i'M UNDER ATTACK"

DarkFate and the other minions joined to Necross and opened fire 
against the maximals


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "The Ultimate Archfiend of Darkness, 
Devouring" <bustercross365@y...> wrote:
> Necross/ Splattercannon:
> 
> Necross jumped out of the tree, landed and approached Cryaltron.  
He 
> brought his right arm up and opened up with a volley og missiles, 
> followed with a blast of his acid blaster.
> 
> Splattercannon turned and focused now on Blackfang.  He fired 
bursts 
> of his gatling rifle, hoping to catch the Maximal off guard.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, aerosmith4e@c... wrote:
> > Cryaltron saw the shots and detected maximal signatures. "Over 
> there!" He blasted off towards the shooting and shot off his 
crystal 
> missles and plain crystals that would skewer anything it 
penetrated 
> on the opposing bots.
